website_summaries.verdict: This is the ultimate toy set for getting the band together, and there isn’t a fan of the Chipmunks who wouldn’t appreciate receiving all 3 cute and huggable brothers.
pros: 3 pack of plush toys: Alvin, Simon, and Theodore
Variety of fabric textures used for their clothes
cons: Their felt hair isn’t the most attractive

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: These dolls are the cutest! My daughter is going through an Alvin and the Chipmunks phase and she takes them everywhere! There not too big and bulky and are the perfect size for a 4 year old to take along and play with.
customer_reviews.author: Cherry A

customer_reviews.title: 4 year old loves them!
customer_reviews.text: My four year old has found Alvin and the Chipmunks, got this as a surprise for a good day at school. He was very happy with them and couldn't believe he had chipmunk lovies
customer_reviews.author: asicas

customer_reviews.title: All three chipmunks sold together.
customer_reviews.text: My four year old nephew is in the Alvin chipmunks stage!! Amazon is the only site I found them . All three chipmunks are sold together. Great fun for him.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good size. I bought it for my 2 year old grandson and he loved it. They fit his little hands perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Nilsa Morales

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter loves her chipmunks
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old granddaughter opened her new birthday present, squealed and ran to give me a hug! Needless to say, the chipmunks were a real hit with her. They are of good quality and look just like the movie chipmunks. I am pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cuter then the photo
customer_reviews.text: These are adorable- much better quality and cuter than the photos. My 3.5 year old loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. G

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: My grandson absolutely loves Alvin and his buds...the picture is a little weird but when they arrive they are very cute! Great value too.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Great condition and size!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for kids to easily cuddle and cart around!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Na
customer_reviews.text: I just wish it was a little bigger other than that love it
customer_reviews.author: mariana

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what my son wanted
customer_reviews.text: He’s a big Alvin and the chipmunk fan and he loves em!!!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Castro

customer_reviews.title: Georgeous
customer_reviews.text: bought several of these for my Granddaughters birthday, she LOVED them
customer_reviews.author: E Daniel

product_meta.title: Alvin and the Chipmunks 8.5" Plush Set - Simon and Theodore
product_meta.description: Beloved characters from the Alvin and the Chipmunks, Soft and Cuddly Plush, Each plush is about 8.5" tall
feature_bullets: Beloved characters from the Alvin and the Chipmunks
